segments.source_content:
---
id: admonitions
description: Handling admonitions/callouts in Docusaurus Markdown
slug: /markdown-features/admonitions
---
# Admonitions
In addition to the basic Markdown syntax, we have a special admonitions syntax by wrapping text with a set of 3 colons, followed by a label denoting its type.

translations.zh-hant: 除了基本的 Markdown 語法外，我們還提供特殊的提示框語法：用三組冒號包裹文字，並在起始冒號後加上類型標籤。

segments.source_content: Example:

```md
:::note

Some **content** with _Markdown_ `syntax`. Check [this `api`](#).

:::

:::tip

Some **content** with _Markdown_ `syntax`. Check [this `api`](#).

:::

:::info

Some **content** with _Markdown_ `syntax`. Check [this `api`](#).

:::

:::warning

Some **content** with _Markdown_ `syntax`. Check [this `api`](#).

:::

:::danger

Some **content** with _Markdown_ `syntax`. Check [this `api`](#).

:::
```

```mdx-code-block
<BrowserWindow>

:::note

Some **content** with _Markdown_ `syntax`. Check [this `api`](#).

:::

:::tip

Some **content** with _Markdown_ `syntax`. Check [this `api`](#).

:::

:::info

Some **content** with _Markdown_ `syntax`. Check [this `api`](#).

:::

:::warning

Some **content** with _Markdown_ `syntax`. Check [this `api`](#).

:::

:::danger

Some **content** with _Markdown_ `syntax`. Check [this `api`](#).

:::

</BrowserWindow>
```
## Usage with Prettier {#usage-with-prettier}

If you use [Prettier](https://prettier.io) to format your Markdown files, Prettier might auto-format your code to invalid admonition syntax. To avoid this problem, add empty lines around the starting and ending directives. This is also why the examples we show here all have empty lines around the content.

translations.zh-hant: 若您使用 [Prettier](https://prettier.io) 格式化 Markdown 文件，Prettier 可能會將程式碼自動格式化為無效的提示框語法。為避免此問題，請在起始和結束指令周圍添加空行。這也是為何此處展示的範例都在內容周圍留有空行。

segments.source_content:
```md
<!-- Prettier doesn't change this -->
:::note

Hello world

:::

<!-- Prettier changes this -->
:::note
Hello world
:::

<!-- to this -->
::: note Hello world:::
```
## Specifying title {#specifying-title}
You may also specify an optional title.

translations.zh-hant: 您也可以選擇性地指定標題。

segments.source_content:
```md
:::note[Your Title **with** some _Markdown_ `syntax`!]

Some **content** with some _Markdown_ `syntax`.

:::
```

```mdx-code-block
<BrowserWindow>

:::note[Your Title **with** some _Markdown_ `syntax`!]

Some **content** with some _Markdown_ `syntax`.

:::

</BrowserWindow>
```
## Nested admonitions {#nested-admonitions}
Admonitions can be nested. Use more colons `:` for each parent admonition level.

translations.zh-hant: 提示框可以嵌套使用。每增加一層父級提示框，就使用更多冒號 `:`。

segments.source_content:
```md
:::::info[Parent]

Parent content

::::danger[Child]

Child content

:::tip[Deep Child]

Deep child content

:::

::::

:::::
```

```mdx-code-block
<BrowserWindow>

:::::info[Parent]

Parent content

::::danger[Child]

Child content

:::tip[Deep Child]

Deep child content

:::

::::

:::::

</BrowserWindow>
```
## Admonitions with MDX {#admonitions-with-mdx}

translations.zh-hant: ## 在 MDX 中使用提示框 {#admonitions-with-mdx}

segments.source_content: You can use MDX inside admonitions too!

translations.zh-hant: 您也可以在提示框內使用 MDX！

segments.source_content:
```jsx
import Tabs from '@theme/Tabs';

import TabItem from '@theme/TabItem';

:::tip[Use tabs in admonitions]

<Tabs>
  <TabItem value="apple" label="Apple">This is an apple 🍎</TabItem>
  <TabItem value="orange" label="Orange">This is an orange 🍊</TabItem>
  <TabItem value="banana" label="Banana">This is a banana 🍌</TabItem>
</Tabs>

:::
```

```mdx-code-block
<BrowserWindow>

:::tip[Use tabs in admonitions]

<Tabs>
  <TabItem value="apple" label="Apple">This is an apple 🍎</TabItem>
  <TabItem value="orange" label="Orange">This is an orange 🍊</TabItem>
  <TabItem value="banana" label="Banana">This is a banana 🍌</TabItem>
</Tabs>

:::

</BrowserWindow>
```
## Usage in JSX {#usage-in-jsx}
Outside of Markdown, you can use the `@theme/Admonition` component to get the same output.

translations.zh-hant: 在 Markdown 之外，您可以使用 `@theme/Admonition` 元件來獲得相同的輸出效果。

segments.source_content: The types that are accepted are the same as above: `note`, `tip`, `danger`, `info`, `warning`. Optionally, you can specify an icon by passing a JSX element or a string, or a title:

translations.zh-hant: 接受的類型與上述相同：`note`、`tip`、`danger`、`info`、`warning`。您也可以選擇性地傳遞 JSX 元素、字串作為圖標，或指定標題：

segments.source_content:
```jsx title="MyReactPage.jsx"
<Admonition type="tip" icon="💡" title="Did you know...">
  Use plugins to introduce shorter syntax for the most commonly used JSX
  elements in your project.
</Admonition>
```

```mdx-code-block
<BrowserWindow>
  <Admonition type="tip" icon="💡" title="Did you know...">
    Use plugins to introduce shorter syntax for the most commonly used JSX
    elements in your project.
  </Admonition>
</BrowserWindow>
```
## Customizing admonitions {#customizing-admonitions}
There are two kinds of customizations possible with admonitions: **parsing** and **rendering**.

translations.zh-hant: 提示框有兩種自訂方式：**解析** 和 **渲染**。

segments.source_content: ### Customizing rendering behavior {#customizing-rendering-behavior}

You can customize how each individual admonition type is rendered through [swizzling](../../swizzling.mdx). You can often achieve your goal through a simple wrapper. For example, in the follow example, we swap out the icon for `info` admonitions only.

translations.zh-hant: 您可以透過 [swizzling](../../swizzling.mdx) 自訂每種提示框類型的渲染方式。通常只需簡單的包裝即可達成目標。例如，在以下範例中，我們僅替換了 `info` 提示框的圖標。

segments.source_content: ### Customizing parsing behavior {#customizing-parsing-behavior}

Admonitions are implemented with a [Remark plugin](./markdown-features-plugins.mdx). The plugin is designed to be configurable. To customize the Remark plugin for a specific content plugin (docs, blog, pages), pass the options through the `admonitions` key.

translations.zh-hant: 提示框是透過 [Remark 插件](./markdown-features-plugins.mdx) 實現的。該插件設計為可配置。若要為特定內容插件（文檔、部落格、頁面）自訂 Remark 插件，請透過 `admonitions` 鍵傳遞選項。

segments.source_content: The plugin accepts the following options:

- `keywords`: An array of keywords that can be used as the type for the admonition.
- `extendDefaults`: Should the provided options (such as `keywords`) be merged into the existing defaults. Defaults to `true`.

translations.zh-hant:
- `keywords`: 可作為提示框類型使用的關鍵字陣列。
- `extendDefaults`: 是否將提供的選項（如 `keywords`）合併到現有預設值中。預設為 `true`。

segments.source_content: The `keyword` will be passed as the `type` prop of the `Admonition` component.

translations.zh-hant: `keyword` 將作為 `type` 屬性傳遞給 `Admonition` 元件。

segments.source_content: ### Custom admonition type components {#custom-admonition-type-components}

By default, the theme doesn't know what do to with custom admonition keywords such as `:::my-custom-admonition`. It is your responsibility to map each admonition keyword to a React component so that the theme knows how to render them.

translations.zh-hant: 預設情況下，主題不知道如何處理自訂提示框關鍵字（如 `:::my-custom-admonition`）。您需要將每個提示框關鍵字映射到 React 元件，以便主題知道如何渲染它們。

segments.source_content: If you registered a new admonition type `my-custom-admonition` via the following config:

translations.zh-hant: 如果您透過以下配置註冊了一個新的 admonition 類型 `my-custom-admonition`：

segments.source_content: You can provide the corresponding React component for `:::my-custom-admonition` by creating the following file (unfortunately, since it's not a React component file, it's not swizzlable):

translations.zh-hant: 您可以為 `:::my-custom-admonition` 提供對應的 React 組件，方法是創建以下文件（不幸的是，由於它不是 React 組件文件，因此無法透過 swizzle 功能生成）：

segments.source_content: Now you can use your new admonition keyword in a Markdown file, and it will be parsed and rendered with your custom logic:

translations.zh-hant: 現在您可以在 Markdown 文件中使用新的 admonition 關鍵字，它將被解析並使用您的自定義邏輯進行渲染：

segments.source_content:
```md
:::my-custom-admonition[My Title]

It works!

:::
```

<BrowserWindow>

:::my-custom-admonition[My Title]

It works!

:::

</BrowserWindow>
